Joelle is a Spanish form of the name Joel. The name Joel is an Anglicized form of the Hebrew name Yoel (יוֹאֵל). It is derived from the Hebrew elements yo an abbreviated form for the Name of the Lord and el an abbreviated form of elohim meaning G-d. Hi my name is Joelle, I was named after my neighbor. She is from France. So the name Joelle is actually a french name, an sorry ladies it has no real meaning. She told me female name is spelled joelle, and the male name is spelled joell. Not too many people actually know this. I'm 41 and I'm glad to have a unique name lol. I hope this helps

Meaning of Joelle. Hebrew name. In Hebrew, the name Joelle means-Jehovah is God.. Other origins for the name Joelle include-Hebrew, French, French.The name Joelle is most often used as a girl name or female name. Hebrew Name Meaning-Jehovah is God.

[ syll. joe -(l) le, jo-e- lle ] The baby girl name Joelle is also used as a boy name, though it is far more popular for girls. Joelle is of Hebrew origin. It is used mainly in English, French, and German. The meaning of Joelle is 'Yahweh is God'. It is a biblical name derived from yahweh 'name of God ' ; el which means 'God, powerful '. The generic name has been used in the Old Testament of the Bible. See also the related form, the name Marie Joelle. Joelle is unusual as a baby girl name. Its usage peaked modestly in 1966 with 0.023% of baby girls being named Joelle. It was #468 in rank then. The baby name has markedly dropped in popularity since then, and is used only on an infrequent scale now
